name: Lava Plume
summary: Deals damage, and all adjacent Pokemon in Double/Triple Battles. It has a 30% chance of burning each target.
viability: Lava Plume is a fantastic move for bulkier Fire types. Not only is it a powerful STAB move, it has great accuracy and a good secondary effect. In Doubles and Triples this is one of the most used moves because it can hit each target.
